instance_template: seminar(1..10). topic("AI"). topic("Bio"). topic("Math"). topic("Chem"). room(1..5). day(1..2). timeslot(1, "morning"). timeslot(2, "late morning"). timeslot(3, "early afternoon"). timeslot(4, "late afternoon").
generator: 1 { topicOf(S, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- seminar(S). 1 { delivered(S, R, T, D) : room(R), timeslot(T, _), day(D) } 1 :- seminar(S).

hard_constraints.description: Ensure every seminar is scheduled exactly once in the programme.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: 1 { delivered(S, R, T, D) : room(R), timeslot(T, _), day(D) } 1 :- seminar(S).

hard_constraints.description: Strict policy: No room may host more than one seminar at any given time.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S1, R, T, D), delivered(S2, R, T, D), S1 != S2.

hard_constraints.description: Compliance requirement: No room is permitted to be booked for more than half of the available time slots on any single day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), day(D), #count { T : delivered(_, R, T, D) } > 2.

hard_constraints.description: Operational policy: Rooms must not host back-to-back sessions; a break is required between consecutive bookings.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(_, R, T1, D), delivered(_, R, T2, D), T2 = T1 + 1.

hard_constraints.description: Facility restriction: Room 3 is offline and unavailable for bookings once the afternoon sessions begin.
Technical compliance: Seminars in Artificial Intelligence and Mathematics require a projector; therefore, they cannot be scheduled in Room 5.
Temporal preference: AI presentations must be scheduled exclusively in the morning or late-morning time slots.
Distribution policy: Biology seminars must be distributed across both days of the symposium.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: bio_on_day(D) :- delivered(S, _, _, D), topicOf(S, "Bio"). :- topicOf(_, "Bio"), day(D), not bio_on_day(D).

hard_constraints.description: Scheduling restriction: It is prohibited to schedule two Biology seminars simultaneously.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- #count { S : delivered(S, _, T, D), topicOf(S, "Bio") } > 1, timeslot(T, _), day(D).

hard_constraints.description: Spatial restriction: Chemistry seminars are solitary in space; no two Chemistry talks may occupy the same room throughout the event.
Segregation policy: Biology and Chemistry sessions must not be scheduled in the same room on the same day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S1, R, _, D), topicOf(S1, "Bio"), delivered(S2, R, _, D), topicOf(S2, "Chem").

hard_constraints.description: Opening ceremony requirement: The first slot of the first day must feature exactly one seminar, and it must be a Mathematics topic.
Closing ceremony requirement: The final slot of the final day must feature exactly one seminar, and it must be a Mathematics topic.
Capacity management: No more than two seminars from the Biology or Chemistry fields may occur at the same moment.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: is_bio_or_chem(S) :- topicOf(S, "Bio"). is_bio_or_chem(S) :- topicOf(S, "Chem"). :- #count { S : delivered(S, _, T, D), is_bio_or_chem(S) } > 2, timeslot(T, _), day(D).

soft_constraints.description: Efficiency objective: Minimize the number of empty time slots across all rooms to optimize venue utilization.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("empty_slot", (R, T, D), 1) :- room(R), timeslot(T, _), day(D), not delivered(_, R, T, D).

soft_constraints.description: Engagement objective: Maximize topic diversity in each time segment by penalizing segments that feature fewer than the four available fields.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: topic_at_time(To, T, D) :- delivered(S, _, T, D), topicOf(S, To). penalty("topic_diversity", (T, D), 4 - C) :- C = #count { To : topic(To), topic_at_time(To, T, D) }, timeslot(T, _), day(D).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Name, Args : penalty(Name, Args, Cost) }.
